name: The Corners
description:
Explore the corners of the universe, where no man was meant to.
____________________________
The Corners adds interesting and unique dimensions based off of Liminal Space's! Explore wonderous lands all by lighting your way through paintings taking you to unique and fascinating places!
____________________________
Credits:
Angel Craig, for creating the amazingly chilling OST!
Slice, for creating the designs of each dimension, and supplying us with beautiful textures!
LudoCrypt, me, for developing the whole thing, and bringing some extra life into her own OST!
